description.0: Sviluppo web, produzione multimediale, discipline umanistiche

description.1-en: Experimental thesis on the importance of Instagram content in modern Italian theatre; using programs written in Python and regular expressions for text and image analysis, Instaloader, NLTK and DyLan.
